/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds and bathed in bright sunlight. The road itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
